mapper.insert: insert into customer (cus_user_id, cus_category, cus_title, cus_content, cus_photo, cus_writetime, cus_answer) values (#{cus_user_id}, #{cus_category}, #{cus_title}, #{cus_content}, #{cus_photo}, now(), #{cus_answer})
mapper.select: select * from customer order by cus_num desc
mapper.update: update customer set cus_category = #{cus_category}, cus_title = #{cus_title}, cus_content = #{cus_content}, cus_photo = #{cus_photo}, cus_answer = #{cus_answer}, cus_writetime = now() where cus_num = #{cus_num}
